name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience in designing and implementing scalable applications. Proficient in **React**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **SQL**. Strong expertise in **Agile**, **Scrum**, CI/CD, and utilizing tools like **Jira**, **Confluence**, and **GitHub Enterprise** for efficient project management and collaboration. Demonstrated ability in software testing using **Jest** and **React Testing Library**, coupled with **PyTest** for Python applications. Skilled in developing intuitive user interfaces while maintaining robust server-side functionality. Excellent communication skills with a strong track record of remote work experience, adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure project success.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed high-performance web applications utilizing **React**, **TypeScript**, and **Redux**, enhancing code maintainability and collaboration across teams.
Implemented automated testing using **Jest** and **React Testing Library** to ensure code quality and reliability, achieving over **90%** code coverage.
Designed and integrated RESTful APIs utilizing **FastAPI** and **SQL** databases, improving data accessibility and system interoperability.
Drove the implementation of **CI/CD** practices using **GitHub Enterprise** and **Jira**, streamlining deployment processes and reducing release cycles by **25%**.
Executed Agile methodologies through **Scrum** frameworks, facilitating efficient project management and team collaboration.
Leveraged **Python** to build backend services, enhancing functionality and performance across the application stack.
Conducted thorough code reviews and provided mentorship, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing within the remote team.
Optimized database operations by developing efficient SQL queries and leveraging indexing strategies, resulting in a **15%** reduction in execution time.
Utilized project management tools like **Confluence** to document processes and collaborate effectively across distributed teams.
Communicated technical concepts clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders, ensuring alignment on project goals and deliverables.

Developed user interfaces using **React** and integrated **TypeScript** for improved type safety, enhancing code quality and maintainability.
Implemented state management solutions utilizing **Redux**, achieving a 20% reduction in application bugs and a smoother user experience.
Designed and executed automated tests using **Jest** and **React Testing Library**, increasing code coverage to **85%** and boosting confidence in deployment processes.
Collaborated in an Agile environment, participating in Scrum meetings and leveraging tools like **Jira** and **Confluence** for project tracking, resulting in a **30%** faster delivery time on sprint tasks.
Developed scalable backend solutions using **Python** and **FastAPI**, achieving response times under **200ms** for API calls.
Managed relational databases utilizing **SQL** and optimized query performance, achieving a **15%** decrease in response times for data retrieval.
Implemented CI/CD processes using **GitHub Enterprise** and **Git**, reducing deployment errors by **25%** and streamlining production workflows.
Engaged in effective communication and collaboration with cross-functional teams to define requirements and timelines, ensuring project alignment and successful execution.
Conducted training sessions on **AI-assisted development** tools for junior developers, fostering skill development and knowledge sharing in a remote work setting.

Utilized **React** and **TypeScript** to develop user-friendly interfaces, enhancing user engagement by **30%**.
Implemented backend services using **Python** and **FastAPI**, resulting in response times under **200ms** for API calls.
Designed and optimized SQL queries to improve database performance, achieving a **25%** improvement in query response times.
Developed unit tests using **Jest** and **React Testing Library** to ensure code quality and reliability, achieving a code coverage of **90%**.
Employed **Redux** for state management in applications, streamlining data flow and component communication.
Participated in Agile methodologies, including daily standups and sprint planning, to maintain project alignment and adhere to timelines.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **Jira** and **Confluence** for efficient project management and documentation.
Maintained version control and collaborative coding practices using **GitHub Enterprise** and **Git**.
Contributed to CI/CD pipelines, enhancing the deployment process and reducing rollback incidents by **15%**.
Communicated effectively with teams in a remote work environment to facilitate project discussions and progress updates.
Assisted in AI-assisted development initiatives, leveraging cutting-edge technologies to enhance coding efficiency and productivity.
